channel.title: Interview Prep on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Interview Prep on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Are You Interested in Travelling
item.description: Does travel bother you? not at all. I like driving and staying in hotel. In fact, I could concentrate on doing things at hotel than at home. How much travel did you have to do in your previous role? And what type of distance were you traveling?

item.title: What Did You Do at
item.description: What did you do at LifeLabs? I was hired at LifeLabs as a lab scientist. I was in responsible for steroid profiling in urine, which included quality control, troubleshooting on analysis and instruments, and method development. I developed two applications to monitor the instrument (GC-MS/MS detector, and lab test data, such as sample data, and QC data).

item.title: What do you know about Our Business?
item.description: Knowledge about Sysmex products # Hematology analyzer for large and small labs. blood coagulation analyzer - Hemostasis. Urinalysis analyzer Flow cytometry Informatics solutions

item.title: Work With Clients
item.description: How would you work with the client? Two aspects: people interaction and technical aspects. Listen client’s complain Easy the emotion Commitment Identify the problem
